body.directions: Select thumbs-up if the statement is true. Select thumbs-down if the statement is not true.

body.quiz:
Frida Kahlo is known for creating self-portraits.

Image of:
body.correct: Way to go! You know that Frida Kahlo is known for the self-portraits she painted.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Give it one more try.
body.failed: Remember, Frida Kahlo is known for the self-portraits she painted.

body.quiz:
Dorothea Lange was a photojournalist who shared important photos of people in the community.

Image of: a photograph of Dorothea Lange taking a picture
body.correct: Great thinking! You know that Dorothea Lange was a photojournalist who shared important photos of migrants during the Great Depression.
body.failed: Remember, Dorothea Lange was a photojournalist who shared important photos of migrants during the Great Depression.

body.quiz:
Digital cameras were the first cameras and were invented in 1850.

Image of: a blue heart illustration
body.correct: Excellent work! You know that there were many cameras invented before the digital camera. Digital cameras were invented in the 1990s.
body.incorrect: So close! I know you can do it.
body.failed: Remember, there were many cameras invented before the digital camera. Digital cameras were invented in the 1990s.
